result.title: Indicative Teaching and Learning Competency Levels (KMUTT PSF)
result.subTitle: The competency statuses presented are derived from your responses to the eight questions above, reflecting your teaching approaches and instructional practices. These results are intended for guidance only and do not determine whether you meet or do not meet any KMUTT PSF competency level.
result.statusGreen: Your teaching practices align with the expected characteristics of the Competent / Proficient competency level.
result.statusYellow: Your teaching practices partially align with the expected characteristics of the Competent / Proficient competency level.
result.statusGray: Your teaching practices do not yet align with the expected characteristics of the Competent / Proficient competency level.
result.pollTitle: After completing the assessment, we would appreciate your feedback.
result.downloadError: Unable to download report at this time
result.permissionError: You don't have permission to access this file

home.title: Professional Development Self-Assessment based on the KMUTT PSF Framework
home.section1Title: What is the purpose of this self-assessment tool?
home.section1Body: This self-assessment tool is intended to support self-reflection and professional growth within the KMUTT PSF at the Competent and Proficient levels. It allows you to consider the competencies you currently demonstrate, explore areas for further development, and identify learning activities that can enhance your teaching and learning strategy.  The outcome may also assist you in deciding whether to pursue KMUTT PSF for Teaching and Supporting Learning.
home.section2Body: The self-assessment simplifies the components of the KMUTT PSF (Teaching and Supporting Learning) at the Competent and Proficient levels into eight short checklist questions. You are invited to select the options that best describe your own teaching and learning practices. The assessment takes around 3â€“5 minutes to complete.
home.section3Title: What will happen to your information?
home.section3Body: Your responses will be saved so you can view the results of the self-assessments you have completed. The combined data will also help us plan teaching and learning development activities that reflect the needs of the KMUTT community.
home.section4Body: Only staff involved in faculty development will have access to individual responses. Information shared with university management will be presented only at an aggregate level and will not identify individuals.
